turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order I would like to order a black and white mocha grande 2% milk with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hmm. i'm not sure i caught that all. first off, where do you want to order from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from the from the Starbucks on Main Avenue, Norwalk, Connecticut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let's see if i got that down correctly. you said you want a grande black and white mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream from Starbucks on main avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. the drink will be ready in 10 mins for pick up. and the receipt has been sent to your mobile device.
